summary.title: AI Summary
summary.willTryEachLanguage: Will try each language in order until a transcript is found
summary.emptyDescription: Enter a YouTube URL to generate an AI-powered summary of the video content. No download required.

errors.invalidUrl: Please enter a valid YouTube URL
errors.aiNotEnabled: AI is not enabled. Please enable AI in Settings first.
errors.noApiKey: API key is not configured. Please add your API key in Settings.
errors.noTitle: Cannot save: video title is missing

chat.title: Youwee
chat.subtitle: Describe your edit
chat.emptyTitle: What would you like to do?

prompts.compressPrompt: Compress video to reduce file size
prompts.overlayPrompt: Overlay the attached image at [position: center/top-left/bottom-right] with [opacity: 100%]
prompts.watermarkPrompt: Add attached image as watermark at bottom-right corner with 50% opacity
prompts.introPrompt: Create a [3] second intro slide from the attached image before the video

player.previewHint: Lower quality for editing - output uses original
player.selectVideoHint: Select a video to start editing
player.thumbnailFallback: Video preview failed — showing thumbnail instead. Use FFmpeg commands to process.
player.thumbnailOnly: Video playback unavailable for this codec — use FFmpeg commands to process

previewConfirm.title: Large Video File
previewConfirm.description: This file is large. Generating a video preview may take a while and use extra disk space.
previewConfirm.createPreviewHint: Generate playable preview (takes longer, uses more space)
previewConfirm.thumbnailOnlyHint: Faster — show a static frame instead

historyDialog.title: Processing History
historyDialog.selectJob: Select a job to view details

logs.title: Logs
logs.emptyDescription: Logs will appear here when you start downloading videos. You'll see the yt-dlp commands executed, success/error messages, and debug output.
logs.stats: Showing {{count}} log entries · Auto-refreshes every 5 seconds

toolbar.clearConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all logs?

troubleshooting.ffmpegMissing: Go to Settings → Dependencies to install FFmpeg
troubleshooting.ytdlpError: Go to Settings → Dependencies to update yt-dlp
troubleshooting.authRequired: Try enabling Cookies in Settings → Network
troubleshooting.privateVideo: This video requires login. Enable Cookies in Settings → Network
troubleshooting.videoUnavailable: This video is no longer available on the platform
troubleshooting.rateLimit: Rate limited by the platform. Wait a few minutes and try again
troubleshooting.proxyError: Check your Proxy settings in Settings → Network
troubleshooting.networkError: Check your internet connection and try again
troubleshooting.cookieLocked: Close your browser completely before downloading, or use Cookie File mode instead
troubleshooting.cookieDpapi: Chrome 127+ blocks cookie access on Windows. Use Firefox or Cookie File mode instead

library.title: Library
library.emptyDescription: Your download history will appear here. Start downloading videos from YouTube or other platforms to see them in your library.

toolbar.clearConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all download history?
